item.title: Meetup.com analysis with interactive Data Visualization using D3.js, DC.js andÂ Python
item.description:
Data visualization,according to data visualization expert Stephen Few, is:”…a collection of methods that use visual representations to explore, make sense of, and communicate quantitative data”.

Data visualization is an interdisciplinary field, which requires several skills like: coding, web development, design, and database.

The source code for this tutorial can be found in this github repository.
item.dc:creator: Lihouma
